title: december 19: ben franklin’s side gig
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about founding father Benjamin Franklin’s other career: writing and printing a yearly almanac. Then, she talks about a song that makes our hearts go on, aka, the release of "My Heart Will Go On" by Celine Dion. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
